name: Jam Studio VR
summary: Jam Studio VR immerses you in a world of music where you interact with virtual musical instruments pre-loaded with notes and riffs to play simply by touching the instruments. Jam Studio VR is made for everyone - no music experience required. Just play and enjoy – no scoring and no judgement. You play what you want, when you want to, cueing the instruments by playing them. It’s all harmonious and musically appropriate, paired and ready for play with dynamic background rhythm tracks adding to your...
